answers.answer: Hi, well the symptoms described by you are quite vague but this could be related to sinusitis, cervical spondylosis causing myopathy or swelling of parotid glands etc.How old are you and any history of hypertension, diabetes or sinusitis? Try pain killers, muscle relaxants (tizanidine) along with hot compression over affected group of muscles, if no response is seen in 3 days, do consult doctor.

question: Hi I have pain on the upper side of the left part of my back, I belive it affects the pressure on my ear (left) and adds pressure around my eye and eyebraws left nostril is congested too sometimes. The feeling is like a bruise when I put pressure on it, I also tend to put pressure on my jaw and I can hear it crack.
title: IF MUSCLE RIGIDITY HOW CAN I HEAL THIS?
